metadata.author: Your Name or Organization
metadata.description: A ready-to-make stovetop stuffing mix made with dried sourdough bread cubes and a flavorful seasoning blend. Just add boiling water and butter!

ingredients.name: Dried Sourdough Bread Cubes
ingredients.notes: Pre-cut and dried sourdough bread cubes.

ingredients.name: Stuffing Seasoning Mix
ingredients.notes: Includes a balanced blend of dried herbs, spices, and bouillon powder.

preparation: Bring 1.5 cups (360 mL) of water to a boil in a medium saucepan.
Remove the saucepan from heat and stir in 2 tablespoons (28g) of melted butter (not included).
Add the entire contents of the stuffing mix package (bread cubes and seasoning) to the saucepan.
Stir well to combine, ensuring all bread cubes are moistened.
Cover the saucepan and let it sit for 5 minutes.
Fluff with a fork before serving.
storage: Keep the product in its original packaging in a cool, dry place.
Once prepared, refrigerate leftovers in an airtight container for up to 3 days.

product_details.required_ingredients: 1.5 cups (360 mL) boiling water, 2 tablespoons (28g) melted butter

contains: Chicken (bouillon powder in the seasoning mix)
